messages.message: So the copy 2000 files on instabase.com (http://instabase.com) had an error (it went away so I didn't copy it) but will the copy still work? It seems odd that we can upload 2000 files if they are large enough (2GB), it doesn't seem to like to copy 2000 files around as well. Is there line of site on this as a clear scalability problem?
Need a bit of clearer description here :slightly_smiling_face: — don’t think i can parse what you are saying here
are you saying that upload of 2000 files works, but copy of 2000 doesn’t?
I had to have Heymian help me upload 2000 files via S3 because it failed via UI (total file size is 2gb).
When I just did a copy of 2000 files it also error'd out and not sure if it did complete or not
